text: As I turn the hat around in my hands, I see some writing on the underside of the brim.
Toyshop? Maybe the suspect bought their hat from a toystore to make it harder to trace.
I would have gone to the specialty hat producers myself to ask about any suspicious customers.
Granted, I think that the suspect may be younger than I initially thought...
